mapper.select: select p.*,c.classify_name,l1.label_name as post_label1_name,l2.label_name as post_label2_name,l3.label_name as post_label3_name from post p left join classify c on p.post_classify_id=c.classify_id left join label l1 on l1.label_id=p.post_label1_id left join label l2 on l2.label_id=p.post_label2_id left join label l3 on l3.label_id=p.post_label3_id limit #{page},#{size}
mapper.sql: post_id, post_title, post_addtime, post_updatetime, post_classify_id, post_browse, post_users_id, post_link, post_copyright, post_label1_id, post_label2_id, post_label3_id
mapper.select:
select
distinct
,
from post
order by ${orderByClause}

distinct
from post
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into post (post_id, post_title, post_addtime, post_updatetime, post_classify_id, post_browse, post_users_id, post_link, post_copyright, post_label1_id, post_label2_id, post_label3_id, post_content) values (#{postId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{postTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{postUpdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{postClassifyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{postBrowse,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{postUsersId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{postLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postCopyright,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postLabel1Id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{postLabel2Id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{postLabel3Id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{postContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
